title: League tabs out when listening to spotify?
body:
Whenever I try to listen to music via spotify, my league of legends tabs out and spotify takes the foreground. I don't know how to fix it! It isn't my keyboard or anything, Spotify works with my other games just fine. 

Any ideas?

replies.body: I haven't really heard of this issue happening, so I'm wondering if you have any hotkeys that might be overlapping with Spotify.  Fancy keyboards or overlays could do that, if there's a function set up for it.  Let me know if that might be the case!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qTVhbp6v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-10T21:15:31.194+0000)
>
> I haven't really heard of this issue happening, so I'm wondering if you have any hotkeys that might be overlapping with Spotify.  Fancy keyboards or overlays could do that, if there's a function set up for it.  Let me know if that might be the case!

I'll check around! I did some googling and spotify made an update like 2 years ago fixing my problem, I'll try checking for updates and reinstalling and such. I only got spotify on this computer a few weeks ago, I'll keep you posted!

Thanks.
